pr_title: Fix a bug where DNS resolution is not timed out

timeline.message:
Fix a bug where DNS resolution is not timed out
Motivation:
DNS resoultion could take longer when there's more than one `DnsServerAddressStream`.

Modifications:
- DNS resolution is timed out after `queryTimeoutMillis`.

Result:
- DNS resolution is timed out after `queryTimeoutMillis`.
- Close #2621

timeline.bodyText: I realized that the search domain query is not cancellable right now. I will send a PR to Netty to fix this.
timeline.author: minwoox

timeline.bodyText: isDone() check is redundant. cancel() does nothing when promise is done already.
